title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Campsite Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Campsite Reservations                Campsite Reservations          Campground reservations for sites within Big South Fork can be made through the National Recreation Reservation Service by calling 1-877-444-6777. Reservations may be made up to 180 days in advance with the exception of group camp which can be reserved up to 360 days in advance.  Â    BANDY CREEK CAMPGROUND  Make a Reservation    HOOK UP SITES  96 SITES  $22.00/NIGHT* 6 PERSON MAX    NON-HOOK UP SITES  49 SITES  $19.00/NIGHT* 6 PERSON MAX    GROUP SITES  2 SITES  $100.00/NIGHT UP TO 25 PEOPLE     For groups with more than 25 persons, there is an extra $3.00* per person per night fee that is collected at the campground.  BLUE HERON CAMPGROUND Make a Reservation    ALL HOOK-UP SITES  45 SITES  $17.00/NIGHT* 6 PERSON MAX       BEAR CREEK HORSE CAMP Make a Reservation    ALL HOOK-UP SITES 23 SITES $28.00/NIGHT* 6 PERSON MAX        *HOLDERS OF GOLDEN AGE/ACCESS PASSPORTS OR INTERAGENCY SENIOR/ACCESS PASS PAY ONLY HALF THE FEE.
